short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze your page’s SEO with one click! Get insights on keywords, meta tags, headings, and more to improve your rankings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get detailed insights on your website's on-page SEO performance with a single click! 🚀 The On Page SEO Report extension provides powerful tools to boost your search engine rankings:

🔍 Keyword Analysis: Discover keyword usage and optimize for relevance.
📝 Meta Tags: Check title, description, and meta tag accuracy.
🏷️ Headings Structure: Analyze your H1-H6 tags for improved hierarchy.
📄 Content Quality: Gain insights on content length, readability, and keyword density.
📐 Page Structure: See how layout and formatting impact SEO.

Ideal for digital marketers, bloggers, and SEO professionals looking to maximize their on-page SEO performance.
